properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
GUINEA.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 09-24.35N 013-44.56W AT
   150206Z SEP. VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR
   OF THIS POSITION AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
   REPORTS TO MDAT-GOG, PHONE: 332 9822 8888,
   E-MAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2859/17.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 221645Z SEP 17.
